full_summary:
### Tender Notice Bilingual Version
#### Title and Reference Number
TBIPS Request for Proposal W8474-24IC10

Reference number: cb-575-3221637

#### Notice of Tender Opportunities
This solicitation seeks two (2) Level 2 and two (2) Level 3 B.1 Business Analysts, one (1) Level 3 B.2 Business Architect, and one (1) Level 3 B.7 Business Transformation Architect to provide business and capability planning and business design support to the Integrated Continuous Acquisition and Disposition (ICAM) project.

#### Invitation to Participate
Prospective bidders are invited to bid for all resource categories listed in this solicitation.

#### Requirements and Experience
Bidders must have experience with business and capability planning, business design, and transformation architecture. Proceeds from this project will be used to leverage business and technical resources to support the ICAM project.

#### Important Details
* The contract is for a fixed term period, with expected start and end dates of February 12, 2024, to February 12, 2025.
* The contractor will provide support on an as-required basis.
* The Director, Electronic Systems Procurement, is seeking a contractor who can meet the requirements of this project.

#### Contact Information
For more information regarding this solicitation, please contact:

Juan Saenz, Chief of Staff
Director of Electronic Systems Procurement
345 Palace Building, 60 Moodie Dr.
Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2
Canada
Phone: 343-596-7090
Email: [MAT.DESProc.3-4.DOSE@forces.gc.ca](mailto:MAT.DESProc.3-4.DOSE@forces.gc.ca)

#### Notice Documents
The following documents have been posted:
[Click here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28524/w8474-24ic10-qa2-en.pdf)
